TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlType extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier

summary.span: 識別使用者介面 (UI) 控制項的類型。

span.span: Identifies the type of a user interface (UI) control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繼承自，可用來識別所代表的控制項類型。 inherits from and is used to identify the type of a control represented by an . 控制項類型取決於使用者介面自動化提供者的開發人員。The control type is determined by the developer of the UI Automation provider. 這個類別包含其本身的靜態欄位來識別控制項的標準類型的物件。This class contains static fields, which are themselves objects, to identify the standard types of controls. 另外還有不符合其中一種定義類型的控制項的類型。There is also a type for controls that do not match one of the defined types. 其中一個控制項的控制項類型可能會變更執行階段的唯一情況是，此控制項支援。The only case where a control's control type might change at run time is where the control supports . 範例是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]清單檢視，可以是或依據目前的檢視。An example is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] list view, which can be a or , depending on the current view. 控制項類型沒有一對一的對等控制項模式。Control types do not have a one-to-one equivalence to control patterns. 控制項可以是只有一個類型，但它可能會支援多個模式或任何模式，根據其特定的功能。A control can be of only one type, but it may support multiple patterns or no patterns at all, depending on its specific functionality. 詳細資訊的各種控制項類型，請參閱[UI 自動化控制項類型](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-control-types.md)。For detailed information on the various control types, see [UI Automation Control Types](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-control-types.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Button
Public Shared ReadOnly Button As ControlType

summary.span: 識別按鈕控制項。

span.span: Identifies a button control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按鈕來執行單一動作時按下。Buttons perform a single action when clicked. 按鈕可用為獨立的控制項或其他控制項類型中的子控制項使用。A button can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 例如，在下拉式方塊控制項中的下拉式箭號是一個按鈕。For example, the drop-down arrow in a combo box control is a button. 當做子控制項使用時，按鈕是中的控制項檢閱[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀目錄 （不在內容檢視中）。When used as a subcontrol, a button is in the control view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree (not in the content view).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Calendar
Public Shared ReadOnly Calendar As ControlType

summary.span: 識別月曆控制項，例如日期選擇器。

span.span: Identifies a calendar control, such as a date-picker.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType CheckBox
Public Shared ReadOnly CheckBox As ControlType

summary.span: 識別核取方塊控制項。

span.span: Identifies a check box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 核取方塊可用為獨立的控制項或其他控制項類型中的子控制項使用。A check box can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 例如，核取方塊，用來選取 （用來管理其內容） 的資料列的方格控制項中的資料列的開頭會出現的控制項檢視中，但不是在內容檢視。For example, a check box at the beginning of a row in a grid control that is used to select the row (used to manipulate the content) appears in the control view but not in the content view. 不過，加上標籤的核取方塊的形式來表示資料是在內容和控制項檢視中。However, a labeled checkbox in a form that represents data is in the content and control views.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType ComboBox
Public Shared ReadOnly ComboBox As ControlType

summary.span: 識別下拉式方塊控制項。

span.span: Identifies a combo box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有兩種變化的下拉式方塊控制項。There are two variations of combo box controls. 簡單下拉式方塊會顯示使用者可以從選取的清單。A simple combo box presents a list that a user can select from. 可編輯的下拉式方塊會顯示選擇清單，也有使用者可以在這裡輸入而受到限制的不是選擇来選取 從清單中選擇一個可編輯的文字區域。An editable combo box presents a list of choices and also has an editable text area where a user can type in a choice instead of being limited to selecting from the choices in the list.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Custom
Public Shared ReadOnly Custom As ControlType

summary.span: 識別不是任何一種已定義控制項類型的控制項。

span.span: Identifies a control that is not one of the defined control types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項型別會指出未識別為其中一個預先定義的控制項類型的控制項 (例如或)。The control type indicates a control that is not identified as one of the predefined control types (such as or ). 控制項開發人員應該檢查其他控制項類型，再指定控制項，其控制項以確定其控制項不提供相同的功能，做為其中一個定義的控制項類型的類型。Control developers should check the other control types before designating their control as a control type to be sure that their control does not provide the same functionality as one of the defined control types. A控制項類型需要額外的工作來實作提供者[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。A control type requires extra work for the provider to implement [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]. 此外，使用者介面自動化用戶端產品將無法預期的控制結構、 鍵盤互動和可能的控制項模式的控制項的控制項類型為基礎。Also, UI Automation client products will not be able to anticipate the control structure, keyboard interaction, and possible control patterns based on the control type of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType DataGrid
Public Shared ReadOnly DataGrid As ControlType

summary.span: 識別資料格控制項。

span.span: Identifies a data grid control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當資料格包含純文字時，控制項類型應該是。When the cells contain only text, the control type should be .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType DataItem
Public Shared ReadOnly DataItem As ControlType

summary.span: 識別資料項目控制項。

span.span: Identifies a data item control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是複雜的項目可以包含許多其他的控制項。A is a complex item that can contain many other controls.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Document
Public Shared ReadOnly Document As ControlType

summary.span: 識別文件控制項。

span.span: Identifies a document control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文件包含一個以上的行首的文字內容。A document contains text content of more than one line.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Edit
Public Shared ReadOnly Edit As ControlType

summary.span: 識別編輯控制項，例如文字方塊。

span.span: Identifies an edit control, such as a text box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可用為獨立的控制項或其他控制項類型中的子控制項使用。An control can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 例如，使用者可以在這裡輸入下拉式方塊控制項中的值區是控制項，並在此情況下的控制項不是內容檢視的一部分。For example, the area where a user can type in a value in a combo box control is an control, and in this case the control is not part of the content view. 控制項也可以代表包含密碼的控制項。 controls can also represent controls that contain passwords. 屬性可讓產品，例如螢幕助讀程式知道是否要顯示的內容。The property enables products such as screen readers to know whether to reveal the contents.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern[] GetNeverSupportedPatterns() cil managed

summary.span: 擷取控制項類型不支援的模式識別項。

span.span: Retrieves the pattern identifiers that are not supported by the control type.
An array of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] pattern identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法適用於使用者介面自動化用戶端，例如測試架構需要找出不允許使用這個控制項類型的所有控制項模式提供者實作。This method is useful for UI Automation clients such as test frameworks for a provider implementation that need to find all control patterns that are not permitted on this control type. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫每個類型的包含做為中的靜態欄位類別。The following example calls on every kind of contained as a static field in the class. [!code-csharp[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/CSharp/GetPatternsForm.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/visualbasic/getpatternsform.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern[][] GetRequiredPatternSets() cil managed

summary.span: 擷取必要模式集合的陣列。

span.span: Retrieves an array of sets of required patterns.
An array of sets of required patterns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 陣列的每個項目包含陣列的模式，且每個項目，這個控制項類型必須支援至少其中一個陣列。Each element of the array contains an array of patterns, and each element that has this control type must support at least one of these arrays. 這個方法適用於使用者介面自動化用戶端需要找出所有可能的模式，例如測試提供者實作的架構。This method is useful for UI Automation clients that need to find all possible patterns, such as testing frameworks for a provider implementation. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫每個類型的包含做為中的靜態欄位類別。The following example calls on every kind of contained as a static field in the class. [!code-csharp[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/CSharp/GetPatternsForm.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/visualbasic/getpatternsform.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty[] GetRequiredProperties() cil managed

summary.span: 擷取此控制項型別的必要屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] 的陣列。

span.span: Retrieves an array of the required property [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] for this control type.
An array of property [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法適用於使用者介面自動化用戶端需要找出所有可能的內容，例如測試提供者實作的架構。This method is useful for UI Automation clients that need to find all possible properties, such as testing frameworks for a provider implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Group
Public Shared ReadOnly Group As ControlType

summary.span: 識別群組控制項，可做為其他控制項的容器。

span.span: Identifies a group control, which acts as a container for other controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 群組是包含不同的控制項類型，以及用來以邏輯方式將這些控制項的容器控制項。A group is a container control that contains different control types and is used to logically associate those controls.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Header
Public Shared ReadOnly Header As ControlType

summary.span: 識別標題控制項，此控制項是資訊欄列標籤的容器。

span.span: Identifies a header control, which is a container for the labels of rows and columns of information.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType HeaderItem
Public Shared ReadOnly HeaderItem As ControlType

summary.span: 識別標題項目，此項目是資訊欄或列的標籤。

span.span: Identifies a header item, which is the label for a row or column of information.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Hyperlink
Public Shared ReadOnly Hyperlink As ControlType

summary.span: 識別超連結控制項。

span.span: Identifies a hyperlink control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超連結控制項巡覽至指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)]當使用者按一下控制項上。A hyperlink control navigates to a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] when a user clicks on the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Image
Public Shared ReadOnly Image As ControlType

summary.span: 識別影像控制項。

span.span: Identifies an image control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當做獨立的控制項或其他控制項類型中的子控制項使用，就可以使用控制項類型。An control type can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 例如，按鈕可以使用映像，而不是文字，表示其功能給使用者。For example, a button can use an image rather than text to indicate its functionality to the user. 只對裝飾性用途使用時，影像會出現在控制項檢視[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀目錄 （不在內容檢視中）。When used only for decorative purposes, an image appears in the control view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree (not in the content view).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType List
Public Shared ReadOnly List As ControlType

summary.span: 識別清單控制項，例如清單方塊。

span.span: Identifies a list control, such as a list box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是控制項型別，其中包含和 （可能）控制項類型。A is a control type that contains and (perhaps) control types. A控制項可用為獨立的控制項或其他控制項類型中的子控制項使用。A control can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 例如，下拉式方塊擁有控制項，其中包含出現在按下下拉式按鈕時的選擇。For example, a combo box has a control that contains choices that appear when the drop-down button is clicked. 做為子控制項，當只在控制項檢視中的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀目錄 （不在內容檢視中）。When used as a subcontrol, a is only in the control view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree (not in content view). 做為子控制項，當沒有`Name`指派屬性。When used as a subcontrol, a does not have a `Name` property assigned. A可以包含控制項。A can contain controls.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType ListItem
Public Shared ReadOnly ListItem As ControlType

summary.span: 識別清單項目控制項，此控制項為清單控制項的子項目。

span.span: Identifies a list item control, which is a child item of a list control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A也可以是清單控制項的子系。A can also be a child of a list control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LocalizedControlType As String
public: property System::String ^ LocalizedControlType { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得控制項類型的描述。

span.span: Gets a description of the control type.

value.span: 控制項類型 (例如 "button") 的當地語系化描述。

span.span: A localized description of the control type, such as "button".

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下列範例中，由反映，找到所有控制項類型及其屬性是輸出的其他資訊。In the following example, all control types are found by reflection, and their properties are output along with other information. [!code-csharp[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/CSharp/GetPatternsForm.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/visualbasic/getpatternsform.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType LookupById(int32 id) cil managed
Public Shared Function LookupById (id As Integer) As ControlType

span.span: Identifier of the control type.

summary.span: 擷取一個可以封裝指定之數值識別項的 。

span.span: Retrieves a that encapsulates a specified numerical identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項類型由正常物件。Normally the type of a control is identified by a object. 這個方法可讓您知道數值識別項時，建構這類物件。This method enables you to construct such an object when only the numerical identifier is known.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Menu
Public Shared ReadOnly Menu As ControlType

summary.span: 識別功能表控制項，例如應用程式視窗中最上層的功能表。

span.span: Identifies a menu control, such as a top-level menu in an application window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 功能表是功能表項目; 集合的容器比方說，會出現下方的控制項**檔案**當您按一下它，並包含**新增**，**開啟**，依此類推。A menu is a container for a collection of menu items; for instance, the control that appears beneath **File** when you click on it and that contains **New**, **Open**, and so on.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType MenuBar
Public Shared ReadOnly MenuBar As ControlType

summary.span: 識別功能表列控制項，此控制項通常包含一組最上層功能表。

span.span: Identifies a menu bar control, which generally contains a set of top-level menus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項類型代表集合的應用程式的最上層功能表容器。A control type represents the container for the set of top-level menus of an application.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType MenuItem
Public Shared ReadOnly MenuItem As ControlType

summary.span: 識別功能表項目控制項。

span.span: Identifies a menu item control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A子系的或控制項。A is a child of a or control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Pane
Public Shared ReadOnly Pane As ControlType

summary.span: 識別窗格控制項。

span.span: Identifies a pane control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A用來以視覺化方式分隔內容內。A is used to visually separate content within a . 使用者通常在按 TAB、 F6 或 CTRL + TAB，視內容而定的窗格之間巡覽。The user typically navigates between panes by pressing TAB, F6, or CTRL+TAB, depending on the context.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType ProgressBar
Public Shared ReadOnly ProgressBar As ControlType

summary.span: 識別進度列控制項，此控制項會以視覺方式指出長時間作業的進度。

span.span: Identifies a progress bar control, which visually indicates the progress of a lengthy operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType RadioButton
Public Shared ReadOnly RadioButton As ControlType

summary.span: 識別選項按鈕控制項，此控制項是一種選取機制，可限制在一個群組中只能選取一個項目。

span.span: Identifies a radio button control, which is a selection mechanism allowing exactly one selected item in a group.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType ScrollBar
Public Shared ReadOnly ScrollBar As ControlType

summary.span: 識別捲軸控制項，例如應用程式視窗中的捲軸。

span.span: Identifies a scroll bar control, such as a scroll bar in an application window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項類型包含一組按鈕和 thumb 控制項可讓使用者使用滑鼠來捲動視窗或項目容器的內容。A control type contains a set of buttons and a thumb control that enable a user using a mouse to scroll the contents of a window or item container. 使用屬性來區分各個所對應的大型遞增、 大型遞減、 遞增小型和小型遞減按鈕項目。Use the property to differentiate between the elements that correspond to the large-increment, large-decrement, small-increment, and small-decrement buttons.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Separator
Public Shared ReadOnly Separator As ControlType

summary.span: 識別分隔符號，可在控制項中建立視覺分割，例如功能表和工具列。

span.span: Identifies a separator, which creates a visual division in controls like menus and toolbars.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Slider
Public Shared ReadOnly Slider As ControlType

summary.span: 識別滑桿控制項。

span.span: Identifies a slider control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項類型所組成一組相關聯的按鈕讓使用者從一組項目選取或設定數值從範圍內的控制項。A control type consists of a set of buttons associated with an control that enable a user to select from a set of items or set a numerical value from within a range.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Spinner
Public Shared ReadOnly Spinner As ControlType

summary.span: 識別微調按鈕控制項。

span.span: Identifies a spinner control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項類型所組成一組按鈕，可讓使用者從一組項目中選取，或設定數值從範圍內。A control type consists of a set of buttons that enable a user to select from a set of items or set a numerical value from within a range.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType SplitButton
Public Shared ReadOnly SplitButton As ControlType

summary.span: 識別分割按鈕，此按鈕可以執行預設動作，也可以展開成含有其他可能動作的清單。

span.span: Identifies a split button, which is a button that performs a default action and can also expand to a list of other possible actions.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType StatusBar
Public Shared ReadOnly StatusBar As ControlType

summary.span: 識別狀態列控制項。

span.span: Identifies a status bar control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項類型通常是 subcontrols 的控制項類型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目。 control types are generally subcontrols of control type [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Tab
Public Shared ReadOnly Tab As ControlType

summary.span: 識別索引標籤控制項。

span.span: Identifies a tab control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是包含至少一個控制項型別子控制項。A is a control type that contains at least one child control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType TabItem
Public Shared ReadOnly TabItem As ControlType

summary.span: 識別索引標籤項目控制項，此控制項代表索引標籤控制項的一個頁面。

span.span: Identifies a tab item control, which represents a page of a tab control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Table
Public Shared ReadOnly Table As ControlType

summary.span: 識別表格。

span.span: Identifies a table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項類型是類似於但只包含文字。A control type is similar to a but contains only text. 資料表也可以包含控制項類型。Tables can also contain control types.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Text
Public Shared ReadOnly Text As ControlType

summary.span: 識別編輯控制項，例如文字方塊或 Rich Text 方塊。

span.span: Identifies an edit control, such as a text box or rich text box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項可用來當作獨立的控制項，例如控制項，或做為子元件，例如區域使用者可以在這裡輸入值。A control can be used as a standalone control, such as an control, or as a subcomponent, such as the area of a where a user can type in a value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Thumb
Public Shared ReadOnly Thumb As ControlType

summary.span: 識別捲軸中的控制項，此控制項可以拖曳至不同位置。

span.span: Identifies the control in a scrollbar that can be dragged to a different position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項當做中的子控制項使用控制項類型。A control is used as a subcontrol in a control type. 子控制項，為沒有。As a subcontrol, a does not have a .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType TitleBar
Public Shared ReadOnly TitleBar As ControlType

summary.span: 識別視窗的標題列。

span.span: Identifies the caption bar on a window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType ToolBar
Public Shared ReadOnly ToolBar As ControlType

summary.span: 識別工具列，例如應用程式視窗中包含一組命令按鈕的控制項。

span.span: Identifies a toolbar, such as the control that contains a set of command buttons in an application window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType ToolTip
Public Shared ReadOnly ToolTip As ControlType

summary.span: 識別工具提示控制項，當指標移至控制項或有時按下 TAB 鍵移至控制項時會出現的資訊視窗。

span.span: Identifies a tooltip control, an informational window that appears as a result of moving the pointer over a control or sometimes when tabbing to a control using the keyboard.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Tree
Public Shared ReadOnly Tree As ControlType

summary.span: 識別樹狀目錄控制項。

span.span: Identifies a tree control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項類型是容器的階層排列或控制項類型。A control type is a container for a hierarchical arrangement of or control types. 樹狀結構的每個節點可以包含其他節點。Each node of a tree can contain other nodes. 包含的子節點的節點可以顯示為展開或摺疊。A node that contains child nodes can be displayed as expanded or collapsed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType TreeItem
Public Shared ReadOnly TreeItem As ControlType

summary.span: 識別 控制項中的節點。

span.span: Identifies a node in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A只為的子控制項使用的可用控制項類型控制項。A control type can be used only as a subcontrol of a control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Window
Public Shared ReadOnly Window As ControlType

summary.span: 識別含有子物件的視窗框架。

span.span: Identifies a window frame, which contains child objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類型的控制項一律支援。Controls of this type always support .
